meanings.definition: A medical doctor specializing in the care of elderly people.
meanings.sent1: Geriatricians help older adults stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother visits geriatricians for her check-ups.
meanings.sent3: The geriatricians at the clinic always have a smile for their elderly patients.
meanings.sent4: To the elderly, geriatricians are like guardian angels in white coats.
meanings.sent5: The geriatricians' dedication to their patients is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: The practice of medicine that focuses on the care of elderly patients.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the needs of older patients is crucial in geriatricians.
meanings.sent2: Geriatricians play a vital role in improving the health of the elderly.
meanings.sent3: The conference on geriatricians was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, geriatricians are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The importance of geriatricians cannot be overstated in our aging population.
